interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Foot Peel Mask For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin & Calluses - Make Your Feet Baby Soft & Get a Smooth Skin, Removes & Repairs Rough Heels
Review Date: 2020/07/23
Store: Monikahair
Average Rating: 2.9
Product Details: {'UPC': '739515020639'}
Review Text: I live in a really dry climate so my skin gets dry and cracked easily.  I also like to wear flip flops a lot which makes my feet especially dried out.  I used the Baby Feet and two days later the peeling began.  I think Im on day four now and they are almost done peeling.  My feet already look so much better and feel so much softer.  I would definitely use again in the future!
Review Title: Works amazingly well!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
BeautyBio GloPRO Regeneration Tools {'Product Dimensions': '9.88 x 2.38 x 7.88 inches; 1.3 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'ZumYu', 'Batteries': '2 AAA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '810813030237 851262002673', 'Manufacturer': 'BeautyBio', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} This is a very nice Microneedling tool. Although it is probably more of an exfoliation than a true microneedling session by a pro, it definitely makes a difference. No redness, no swelling and no bleeding. Skin was definitely softer after use and moisturizer was absorbed better and more thoroughly.

The 2 different sized rollers and red light therapy are a nice bonus.

Recommend. Really nice Replacement Toothbrush Heads Compatible For Oral-B Braun Electric Toothbrush ,Sensitive brush heads Extra soft bristles. 8 Count YuanJian {'Brand': 'YuanJian', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Kid', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Extra Soft', 'Number of Pieces': '8', 'Item Form': 'ROUND', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.43 x 0.39 x 2.76 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '633337444805'} Overall a decent alternative to the originals. My brush's didn't feel extremely soft but they weren't stiff or hard either. To me they compare the normal brush head stiffness of original Oral B heads.

I still prefer the floss head type, but these will work just fine. Good replacement brush 1 Ounce Hyaluronic Acid Serum for Skin – Hydrating Facial Moisturizer with Anti-Aging Skin Care Properties. Beauty and Skin Care Temer {'Brand': 'Temer', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Hyaluronic_acid', 'Unit Count': '1 Fl. Oz', 'Number of Items': '1'} I really like this Hyaluronic Acid Serum for the face. I haven't used it long enough to comment on the anti-aging effectiveness, but it does sink into my skin very fast. It does not leave a sticky feeling and makes your skin soft and smooth. Absorbs quickly! Mountain Falls Regular Dip-It Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 6 Fluid Ounce Mountain Falls ["Don't wait for your next spa day to treat yourself. Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover Dip-It has been carefully formulated to quickly and gently care for your nails. The salon quality formula softens cuticles and contains Vitamin E. Our formula is free of preservatives, Parabens, and Phthalates. Try Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover Dip-It today."] {'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 3 x 3 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Vi-Jon'} I use to buy this kind of product in the past and was just as pleased as I remember! Easy to use and no mess. Just stick your nail in and after a few twists all the polish is removed. Nice, convenient and a great price! Quick results! Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set. Natwag {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'} I love these makeup remover pads from Natwag! My college age daughter bought some and they worked great for her, so I decided to try them too. I was surprised at how easily they remove makeup. I really like that I will not have to buy cotton pads anymore. They come will a really nice zippered bag to wash them in. Overall, I'm very happy and would recommend to anyone! Awesome! Foot Peel Mask For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin & Calluses - Make Your Feet Baby Soft & Get a Smooth Skin, Removes & Repairs Rough Heels Monikahair {'UPC': '739515020639'} I live in a really dry climate so my skin gets dry and cracked easily. I also like to wear flip flops a lot which makes my feet especially dried out. I used the Baby Feet and two days later the peeling began. I think Im on day four now and they are almost done peeling. My feet already look so much better and feel so much softer. I would definitely use again in the future! Works amazingly well!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** The user continues to prioritize skincare and beauty tools, recently broadening their focus to include nail and foot care products, particularly those that address dryness and roughness. They maintain a strong interest in reusable cleansing tools and hydrating solutions, especially anti-aging serums, while reinforcing their commitment to sustainability in personal care.

- **User Preference:** They prefer effective, gentle, and sustainable solutions that enhance skin softness and absorption. This now extends to effective treatments for foot care, reflecting a growing attentiveness to overall skin health, including the condition of their feet, in conjunction with eco-friendly practices.

- **Positive Experience Indicators:** The user expresses satisfaction with multifunctional products that deliver noticeable results, particularly in enhancing skin texture. Their recent experience with a foot treatment further emphasizes their approval of products that provide effective results in softening and repairing skin while remaining comfortable to use.

- **Performance Expectations:** Consistent with their previous behaviors, they expect clear benefits without irritation across all personal care categories, reaffirming their standards for quality and effectiveness.

- **Recommendation Behavior:** They are inclined to recommend products that embody their reliability and innovation standards, particularly those that provide effective and convenient solutions in enhancing their holistic self-care rituals.

The user’s evolving interests illustrate an appreciation for comprehensive personal care that harmonizes efficacy with sustainability, further reflecting a well-rounded approach to beauty and skincare.
